description: Surrogate primary key for the row that links a fuel import data category to a specific importing operator/provider.
Foreign key referencing the cataloged fuel import data category/format (e.g., transactions, pricing, invoices) used in this operator mapping; confirm specific categories with SME.

Foreign key referencing the external operator/provider that supplies the fuel data import (e.g., fuel card issuer or integration partner) associated with this mapping; confirm operator scope with SME.
